name: Vanguard (itch)
description:
Vanguard is a 2D action arcady shooter with a procedurally generated environment set in outer space, battle your way through endless waves of enemies, blow up large space station or discover planets. Earn scrap materials to unlock new weapons to assist in defeating the onslaught of pirate attackers.

Main Features

* Addictive
* Different Weapons
* Collecting Materials
* Waves of Enemies
* Drifting and Dodging 
* Procedurally Generated Environment

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to rotate turret
  • Left click to fire weapons
  • Tab for upgrade menu
  • Space to boost

Social:

  • Website : http://www.almightymushroom.com/
  • Twitter : https://twitter.com/Cas_Developer

Minimum requirements

  • 1 GHz or faster 32-bit or 64-bit processor
  • 1 GB Memory
  • 2 GB available hard disk space
  • DirectX 9 graphics device
